vocabInfos.lsjDefs:
ἐπιφώσκω,
=ἐπιφαύσκω, grow towards daylight, dawn, [NT+1st c.AD+]
__II transitive, let shine forth, φέγγος poetical de herb.[Refs]
vocabInfos.mediumDef:
to dawn, begin, shine forth
to dawn, Mt. 28:1; hence, used of the reckoned commencement of the day, to be near commencing, to dawn on, Lk. 23:54*
vocabInfos._es_Definition: iniciar, amanecer, comenzar ; al amanecer el primer día de la semana (MAT.28:1)
vocabInfos._vi_Definition: lúc rạng sáng; rạng đông; hửng lên
